```{r}
set.seed(21)
install.packages("DescTools")
library("DescTools")
```

## Point estimators

Get samples
```{r}
sample_10 <- rpois(10, 5)
sample_50 <- rpois(50, 5)
sample_100 <- rpois(100, 5)
```

Point estimator 1: MLE
```{r}
mle <- function(sample) {
  mean(sample)
}

mle(sample_10)
mle(sample_50)
mle(sample_100)
```


## Confidence intervals
``` {r}
PoissonCI(x=50, n=10, conf.level = 0.95, method = c("exact", "score", "wald"))
PoissonCI(x=250, n=50, conf.level = 0.95, method = c("exact", "score", "wald"))
PoissonCI(x=500, n=100, conf.level = 0.95, method = c("exact", "score", "wald"))
```
